segments.text: Oh man, that sink is a total disaster with water gushing everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's pouring over like a waterfall onto the floor—gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's standing in it, drying a plate like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Who leaves the faucet on like that? So careless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids are climbing around in this mess for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool's filthy from the floor, and he's stretching all over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar's open, probably attracting ants or something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's hand out there, waiting in the puddle zone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just sloppy and unhygienic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even the cabinets are getting soaked; it'll smell musty soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden looks clean, but inside it's a pigsty.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand watching this unclean chaos unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone turn off that faucet before it's worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
